faq.title: Return & Refund
faq.content:
If you don't like your order or you changed your mind once you have received it, you can return it within 14 days from the delivery date.

You just need to contact us, but we are sure you will love our products!

faq.title: Taxes and customs
faq.content: Note for the customers outside the European Union: any local tax (e.g. VAT/GST) and customs charges are not included and are at the recipient's expense.

help.contact: Questions? Ask to our operators

paypal.title: paypal
paypal.hint: by placing the order, you will be redirected to the PayPal website to sign in and authorize the payment

wire_transfer.title: wire transfer
wire_transfer.hint: after placing the order, you will need to manually complete the payment with your bank
